name: Land of The Rat Puppets
description:
A surreal slice of life, following the last days of Jah Bulon, a "genie" power broker, as he tries to pay off his debts, and make the wishes of his clients come true.
Your choices have consequences. Some choices have knock-on effects on other choices.

Submittion to the IGDA Foundation Game Jam 2022

Created by Isaque Sanches
Music: "Gagool" by Kevin MacLeod (royalty free: link)

Author's note: the current version has less than 30% of the planned story content. There's always a bit of overambition in game jams, but this is probably is one of the most overscoped jam projects I've ever made. Regardless of that, I'm still quite happy with the result. I plan to one day revisit this game and finish all the plot threads, with all 10 characters.
